tool_description: Estimates renovation costs including fixtures, materials, labor, and permits based on specified quality levels and local market rates.

fixture_list.description: List of fixtures: toilet, vanity, shower, etc.

quality_level.description: Overall quality tier: budget, mid-range, or premium

labor_included.description: Whether to include professional labor costs

region.description: Geographic region for cost adjustment: northeast, southeast, midwest, southwest, west

plumbing_complexity.description: Plumbing work scope: simple, moderate, or extensive

error_messages: Invalid fixture list: Provide at least one fixture from standard bathroom fixtures.
Invalid quality level: Use budget, mid-range, or premium.
Invalid region: Use northeast, southeast, midwest, southwest, or west.
Invalid plumbing complexity: Use simple, moderate, or extensive.
Cost calculation error: Unable to generate reliable cost estimate with provided parameters.
usage: Specify fixture list, quality level, labor inclusion, and region. Optionally set demolition, plumbing complexity, and electrical work requirements. The tool provides detailed cost breakdown.

fixture_costs.description: Total cost of all fixtures and materials
